function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"High cost of borrowing for smes in developing nations","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Credit constraints affecting smes’ employment and operations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Logistics disruptions in the short run","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Structural challenges in the long run","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise in cash flow risk for smes","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of academic study on the impact of covid-19 on asean economies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on smes in asean countries","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unpreparedness of smes to face disruptions caused by covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of contagion due to the close physical proximity of individuals within the built environment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to finance for smes","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close proximity of individuals in smes can lead to the rapid spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear legal basis for pseudonymization conversions","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate data governance and quality control","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of interoperability in cross-border exchange of electronic health data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential lack of standardised data collection methods","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unequal resource reliance in federated approaches","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inability to directly interact and view data in federated systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of local support for legal and informatics aspects","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of common standards in health data across member states","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Stringent local legal and ethical requirements hindering timely research in public health threats","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of coordination and harmonization in covid-19 patient cohorts","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sensitive participant-level clinical data usage and privacy concerns","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of interoperability between community-developed data standards","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Classical format of research funding is slow and may not generate evidence and knowledge fast enough in dynamic situations like a pandemic.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Competitive nature of funding calls overlooks certain eu regions, leading to limited participation from those areas.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of standard wording for broad informed consent may hinder data sharing and collaboration in research projects.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Knowledge scouting activities are not included, leading to delayed evidence production and limited confirmation of scientific importance.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential risk of data breaches in centralised data repositories leading to unauthorized access and use of sensitive information.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of privacy breaches and data misuse in federated data analysis and machine learning due to lack of standardized security measures across local nodes.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Adopting a centralised infrastructure for data management","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ethical considerations in accessing patient records","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of standardized reporting for cohort data and international code linkage","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Integration of data from large-scale cohort data sets across europe","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enrollment of over 1,300,000 individuals in the orchestra cohort","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poorly documented process of harmonising and integrating data from existing projects","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for future strategies for largescale harmonisation of individual data","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Challenges in controlling competing risks and biases when harmonizing data from heterogeneous populations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of robust and trustful data sharing infrastructures in the medical world","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Suboptimal data science literacy in the health sector","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of regulatory health-related data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Constraints of sharing and utilizing sensitive health data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of neighborhood social capital limits access to healthcare and information, contributing to disease factors and exacerbating
